custom.name: report.total.sale
custom.title: Total sale
custom.dataset: select self.fullName as total , self.phoneNumber as pno ,self.numberOfChild as cno from Person self where self.numberOfChild < 4
custom.template:
jaga

20%
Monthly

custom.name: report.total.child
custom.title: Total Child
custom.template: <report-box icon='fa fa-level-up' label='Total Child' value='first.total' tag='first.tag' percent='first.percent' tag-css='first.tagCss'/>
